mapper.select: SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, p.category_id, c.category_name, i.img_url, p.price, p.brand_id, p.seller_uid, p.size, p.quality, p.deal_means, p.safe_deal, p.update_date, p.selling_status, m.user_rank, m.user_name FROM ( SELECT product_id FROM tbl_like WHERE uid = #{uid}) l, tbl_category c, tbl_product_img i, tbl_product p, tbl_member m WHERE l.product_id = p.product_id AND p.category_id = c.category_id AND p.product_id = i.product_id AND i.img_main = "1" AND p.seller_uid = m.uid ORDER BY p.update_date DESC LIMIT #{firstIndex}, #{rowsPerPage}
